title: Microsoft Azure
description: Azure is a cloud platform with more than 200 products and services designed to help you bring new solutions to life
descriptionOfFreePlan: Azure functions, static web apps and virtual machine

featuresInfo.description: Full stack web app hosting platform
featuresInfo.limitations: 10 app, 100GB bandwidth, 2 custom domains and 0.5 GB storage

featuresInfo.description: Virtual Machine for windows and linux
featuresInfo.limitations: 750 hours each for windwos and linux VM, one 64GB storage
